body_html:
I met the same question :
GLIBCXX_3.4.20 not found(required by cmake)
CXXABI_1.3.9' not found (required by cmake)
GLIBCXX_3.4.21' not found (required by cmake)
and I uninstall gcc but when i install from source ,i met some errors such as:
Performing Test BLAS_F2C_DOUBLE_WORKS - Failed

Anyone know how to understand this error and how to solve it? Thanks
